forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers. Partly sunny. High near 34, with temperatures falling to around 32 in the afternoon. West northwest wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Snow Showers then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers before 8pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 21. West wind 2 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow after 1pm. Mostly cloudy. High near 34, with temperatures falling to around 32 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 2 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday Night
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of 5 to 9 inches possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow before 4am, then rain and snow. Cloudy, with a low around 28. South southeast wind 6 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of 5 to 9 inches possible.

nubsNob.comments: We are going to open the Lodge, General Store, Tune Center, Cafeteria and Pub on Black Friday and Small Business Saturday. Doors will be open from 9:00 â€“ 4:00 both days, with the Michigan-Ohio State game on in the pub. Early season tuning specials run through November 29. Get your skis and boards in soon! The General Store also has many great gift ideas for the skier on your list.
